org.apache.ignite.ml.knn.utils.indices

Class BallTreeSpatialIndex<L>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.knn.utils.indices.BallTreeSpatialIndex<L>
  • Type Parameters:
    L - Label type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, SpatialIndex<L>

    public class BallTreeSpatialIndex<L>
extends Object
implements SpatialIndex<L>
    Ball tree based implementation of SpatialIndex. Asymptotic runtime complexity of finding k closest elements is O(log(n)*k), but it degrades on high dimensional data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a new instance of Ball tree spatial index.

        public List<LabeledVector<L>> findKClosest(int k,

        Finds k closest elements to the specified point.
        Specified by:
        findKClosest in interface SpatialIndex<L>
        Parameters:
        k - Number of elements to be returned.
        pnt - Point to be used to calculate distance to other points.
